channel.description: Recent content in stoicism on Shoonya

item.title: Stoicism in the times of COVID-19
item.description: It would be an understatement to say obstacles are all around for people who got affected by COVID-19, for businesses that got impacted, and for people who got laid off in a 3 minute Zoom callor an e-mail in the morning. What do you do when the black swan event of the century turns a normal day into a day where you wonder about how you are going to survive this crisis.
